hymn.title: Deep in me, Lord, mark Thou Thy holy Cross

layout.singingstanza: Deep in me, Lord, mark Thou Thy ho -- ly Cross, On mo -- tives, choic -- es, pri -- vate dear de -- sires. Let all that self in a -- ny form in -- spires Be un -- to me as dross.

lyrics.stanza: Deep in me, Lord, mark Thou Thy holy Cross, On motives, choices, private dear desires. Let all that self in any form inspires Be unto me as dross.
And when Thy touch of death is here and there Laid on a thing most precious in mine eyes. Let me not wonder, let me recognize The answer to my prayer.
